description.male: Duchess Trailter's eight cats all ran away while she was out picking prunes. Help her find them, and she might give {name} a small reward.
description.female: Duchess Trailter's eight cats all ran away while she was out picking prunes. Help her find them, and she might give {name} a small reward.

male: {name} wasn't able to find a single cat.
In fact, Duchess Trailter is convinced {name} only scared her cat off more.
female: {name} wasn't able to find a single cat.
In fact, Duchess Trailter is convinced {name} only scared her cat off more.

male: {name} wasn't able to find a single cat.
The Duchess being rich and old, she still rewarded {name}'s efforts with a small amount of coin.
female: {name} wasn't able to find a single cat.
The Duchess being rich and old, she still rewarded {name}'s efforts with a small amount of coin.

male: {name} was able to find all of Duchess Trailter's cats, albeit not without a few scratches.
female: {name} was able to find all of Duchess Trailter's cats, albeit not without a few scratches.

male: {name} was able to find all Trailter's cats, and {name} even brought back a few more strays for her to take care of.
female: {name} was able to find all Trailter's cats, and {name} even brought back a few more strays for her to take care of.
